title: Bitcoin Price Watch: Price Teeters at $109K—Breakout or Breakdown Ahead?

body.raw: Bitcoin is trading at $109,449 with a market capitalization of $2.18 trillion and a 24-hour trading volume clocking in at $20.54 billion. The intraday range? A tightrope walk between $109,276 and $109,761—just enough motion to keep traders twitchy but not thrilled. Bitcoin So, wh
